com.google.android.drdat.cl.Smi

Smi Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Provide access to the SMI url.

The base url is defined in strings.xml as SmiUrl. The url can be changed to another value. Any new url is stored in shared preferences.

Author:
cal

static void set ( Context  context,
String  url 
) [static]

Change the smi url to another url.

You need to use a fully qualified url such as: http://somedomain.org/someurl/ The url should end in /.

Parameters:
context to use for setting the smi url in shared preferences
url to save

static void reset ( Context  context  )  [static]

Change the smi url back to the default defined in strings.xml.

Parameters:
context to use to get shared preferences and strings.xml.
